sys_script_include.name: leave_calculator

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_7a64986b834eea10216cf7a6feaad3fb
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_1777187_leave_0.leave_calculator</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><mobile_callable>false</mobile_callable><name>leave_calculator</name><sandbox_callable>false</sandbox_callable><script><![CDATA[var leave_calculator = Class.create();
leave_calculator.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
 
	getDifference: function(){
		var date1= new GlideDateTime();
		date1.setValue(this.getParameter('sysparm_start'));
		var date2=new GlideDateTime();
		date2.setValue(this.getParameter('sysparm_end'));
 
		var duration=GlideDate.subtract(date1,date2);
		return duration.getNumericValue();
 
	},
 
    type: 'leave_calculator'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-06-16 05:24:05</sys_created_on><sys_id>7a64986b834eea10216cf7a6feaad3fb</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>leave_calculator</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Leave Request Management" source="x_1777187_leave_0">8484ac5d83ce2210216cf7a6feaad358</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Leave Request Management">8484ac5d83ce2210216cf7a6feaad358</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_7a64986b834eea10216cf7a6feaad3fb</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-06-16 05:24:05</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
